title: Who Is Alex Medina?
description: Alex Medina wears multiple creative hats. And if you haven’t seen one of his viral tweets, there’s a good chance you’ve listened to the music he’s produced or bought merch that he designed, or you've played Fortnite with him late at night. Grammy award-winning music producer, art director, and designer, Alex Medina can really do it all and we're excited to have him on the podcast this week to discuss how he creates, the tools he uses, and how to make money as a creative.
